steps.add_size_chart:
- Tại màn Create size charts, tạo mới size chart với các thông tin + Nhập style

size_chart_info.description_html:
Please read the size chart carefully before choosing yours and allow 1-3 cm differs due to manual measurement

HAWAIIAN SHIRT SIZE CHART (Unisex)
SIZE BUST LENGTH SHOULDER SLEEVE
S 37,7 (inc) 27.1 (inc) 17.3 (inc) 7.8 (inc)
M 40.9 (inc) 28.0 (inc) 18.1 (inc) 8.3 (inc)
L 44.1 (inc) 28.7 (inc) 18.9 (inc) 8.7 (inc)
XL 47.2 (inc) 29.5 (inc) 20.1 (inc) 9.1 (inc)
2XL 50.4 (inc) 30.3 (inc) 20.9 (inc) 9.4 (inc)
3XL 54.3 (inc) 31.1 (inc) 22.0 (inc) 9.8 (inc)
4XL 57.5 (inc) 31.9 (inc) 22.8 (inc) 10.2 (inc)
5XL 61.4 (inc) 32.7 (inc) 24.0 (inc) 10.6 (inc)
6XL 63.0 (inc) 33.5 (inc) 25.2 (inc) 11.8 (inc)

-----*-----

MEN BEACH SHORTS SIZE CHART
SIZE WAIST HIP
S 78 CM 95 CM
M 83 CM 100 CM
L 88 CM 105 CM
XL 93 CM 110 CM
2XL 98 CM 115 CM
3XL 104 CM 120 CM
4XL 110 CM 126 CM
5XL 117 CM 133 CM
6XL 125 CM 141 CM

-----*-----

WOMEN BEACH SHORTS SIZE CHART
SIZE 1/2 WAIST HIP LENGTH
S 30 CM 92 CM 32
M 33 CM 96 CM 33
L 35 CM 100 CM 34.5
XL 37 CM 104 CM 36
2XL 39 CM 108 CM 37.5
3XL 41 CM 112 CM 39

+ Tại Description > Click icon Insert/edit images > Upload image+ Tại Description > Click icon table > Nhập table- Check  hiển thị tại màn preview
